overview: What could be more romantic than going On Vacation? Leah Gotti and Seth Gamble experienced adventure and romance at a sensual swingers retreat. Leah and Seth make love with in a threesome surprise - Gia Paige, Kimmy Granger and James Deen. Leah has a steamy interlude and gets wet in the shower with Jenna Sativa. When Leah and Seth go on a couples date with Sophia Leone and Damon Dice, they make a big splash in the hot tub for a pleasant surprise.
title: Swingers Getaway
